issue.message: The drawable "android12splash" in drawable-night-hdpi has no declaration in the base `drawable` folder or in a `drawable-`*density*`dpi` folder; this can lead to crashes when the drawable is queried in a configuration that does not match this qualifier

The drawable "android12splash" in drawable-night-mdpi has no declaration in the base `drawable` folder or in a `drawable-`*density*`dpi` folder; this can lead to crashes when the drawable is queried in a configuration that does not match this qualifier

The drawable "android12splash" in drawable-night-xhdpi has no declaration in the base `drawable` folder or in a `drawable-`*density*`dpi` folder; this can lead to crashes when the drawable is queried in a configuration that does not match this qualifier

The drawable "android12splash" in drawable-night-xxhdpi has no declaration in the base `drawable` folder or in a `drawable-`*density*`dpi` folder; this can lead to crashes when the drawable is queried in a configuration that does not match this qualifier

The drawable "android12splash" in drawable-night-xxxhdpi has no declaration in the base `drawable` folder or in a `drawable-`*density*`dpi` folder; this can lead to crashes when the drawable is queried in a configuration that does not match this qualifier
